name: Sportscar Snowplow
description:
Snow is covering the race track, strap on some rockets and a plow then get driving!

w or up arrow accelerates

s or down arrow brakes

a/d or left/right arrows to steer

space to use rocket power

Plow as much snow off of the course in the time as you can!

If you clear it all time left is worth a bonus

Made in 3 hours for Trijam 85: Hard-and-fast. Wanted to do something with the player moving fast to make things go flying. I liked the idea of a super powered snow plow so I went with it.
